document.full_text: the first taste of interleague play in 2011 comes this weekend to major league baseball and 15 seasons after it was first introduced during the regular season some of the match-ups still create a buzz.
document.title: mets, yankees on menu in first taste of interleague play
lines_and_colors: the first taste of interleague play in 2011 comes this weekend to major league baseball and 15 seasons after it was first introduced during the regular season some of the match-ups still create a buzz.
